original_title: David Letterman: The Kennedy Center Mark Twain Prize
overview: Emmy Award-winning comic and talk show host David Letterman accepts the 2017 Mark Twain Prize for American Humor. An outstanding lineup of entertainers gathers in the Kennedy Center Concert Hall to salute David Letterman, recipient of the 20th annual Mark Twain Prize for American Humor.
title: David Letterman: The Kennedy Center Mark Twain Prize
